game.name: The Board is Yours
game.categories: Single-player, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Touch Only Option, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Board is Yours는 체스를 기반으로 한 전략적이고 도전적인 인크리멘탈 게임입니다. 칸을 구매하고 업그레이드를 해금하며, 보호된 기물을 활용해 시너지를 연쇄해 생산을 최적화하세요. 보드 전체를 차지할 때까지 끊임없이 재배치하게 될 겁니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Board is Yours is a strategic chess-based incremental game: buy squares, unlock upgrades, and chain synergies through defended pieces. It plays as a demanding idle game where you’ll constantly reposition pieces and optimize your production until the board belongs to you.
